title: Little: Sometimes We Can Be Generous By Taking
description:
In his memoir, actor Rob Lowe recounts a conversation between his young son and President Clinton that shows that sometimes, we can be generous by taking. In this case, the President accepts a tattered stuffed frog.

itunes:subtitle: Accepting what's given to us can give others - and ourselves - joy.
